root.name: Anno 1701: Dawn of Discovery
root.description: Anno 1701: Dawn of Discovery is part of the PC games series. This game uses the touchscreen of the DS extensively. There are 3 game mode options - story mode, continuous play, and multiplayer. The game is played out in real-time and there are a number of choices of which kingdom you wish to represent.
